channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2023101332
item.description:
Report X-2023101332

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: COLONIAL HEIGHTS
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on the trailer damaged and was given to qa. When qa saw that this was a damaged hazmat it was then processed and placed into a salvage drum. DescribePack: When inspected by qa it was found that all 4 of the caps were not tightened before transit because all of the bottles were leaking from the tops. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: When qa saw that this was a damaged hazmat it was then processed and placed into a salvage drum.
